title: A Closer Look At The Pakistani Taliban
teaser: Pakistan's military is calling on the prime minister to take a tougher stance against terrorists, after a brazen attack on the Karachi airport.
contentencoded:
Pakistan’s military is calling on Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif to take a tougher stance against terrorists, including more punitive strikes, after a brazen attack on the Karachi airport this week.

Sharif met with military leaders in a meeting yesterday, and his office says he’ll decide how to go forward in coming days.

The airport attack, which left 39 dead, was followed by another attack nearby, less than two days later.

Thomas Johnson, director of the Program for Culture and Conflict Studies at the Naval Postgraduate School, discusses the Pakistani Taliban with Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson.

Guest

  • Thomas Johnson, professor at the Naval Postgraduate School in Monterey, California, and director of the Program for Culture and Conflict Studies.
